entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Embrace spans more in `System.Reflection.Emit`. #63419
  • Relocation error when app is run from terminal, but works correctly from VS Code debug session #63418
  • AddNETStandardCompatErrorFileForPackaging should allow for libraries to add their own buildTransitive logic #63413
  • [Test] LibariesConfiguration should automatically be detected for runtime tests #63412
  • System.MissingMethod.Exception when using static abstract method #63411
  • Ensure we are building against LTTng with latest fixes #63407
  • [mono][llvm] Fully support .NET exceptions with LLVM on x64, x86, arm64, arm32 #63404
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding "no new features" note to low churn libraries #63401
    7.0.0
  • No way to auto-restart Worker Service running as Windows Service on failure #63400
  • [wasm][aot] Exception Handling Improvements #63399
    7.0.0
  • Enable storing pinned locals in registers #63397
  • Regex NonBacktracking lazy loops with IgnoreCase, and repeaters aren't as lazy as they should be #63395
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: File name: 'Azure.Core, Version=1.19.0.0 #63396
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 comparing to .NET 5 when `TERM` is set to `rxvt` #63387
  • Investigate OutOfMemory Exception happening woth Regex.Match for some patterns in the interpreted engine. #63385
    7.0.0
  • CoreCLR, CoreRT and Android #63384
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer for detecting multiple Enumerations #63381
  • System.Text.Json 6.0.1 - Inclusion of build\System.Text.Json.targets file in NuGet package is causing failure in WiX Heat tool #63379

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Allow to pass switch mappings to Host.CreateDefaultBuilder method along with the command line arguments array #63141
  • Cannot create instance of type 'System.Text.Json.JsonDocument' because it is missing a public parameterless constructor. #63061
    7.0.0
  • Regression: Aborted (core dumped) when running .NET 6.0 app in Docker on linux-arm host #62402
  • .NET built against LTTng 2.13 crashes while initializing LTTng #62398
    7.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when closing HttpListener #63345
    Future
  • [WASM][Browser] DebuggerTests.ArrayTests: EXECUTION TIMED OUT #63167
  • System Management aka WMI isn't working on ARM64 #63137
  • Test failure Interop\\StringMarshalling\\VBByRefStr\\VBByRefStrTest\\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #63003
  • TypeLoadException from dynamically-generated assembly; does not occur from the same assembly loaded from disc #63294
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to find a class without the namespace #62010
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static class attribute #61147
    7.0.0
  • PropertyNamingPolicy is not applied to ExpandoObject/dynamic objects #62101
  • .NET Standard 2.0 should have an overload of Encoding.GetString() that takes a ReadOnlySpan<byte> parameter. #62340
  • Add Repobeats Stats to README.md #62838
  • Path.GetInvalidPathChars() Does not Return the Same Character Set between .NET4.8 and .NET 6.0.1 on Windows #63383
  • Undefined symbol "pthread_create" under FreeBSD when running apps #2463
    Future
  • DotNet HttpClient doesn't give SSL Error While curl and Java fails #55322
    Future
  • libmsquic not on Debian 11 package repository? #60104

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor DllImports in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd #63421
    community-contribution
  • JIT: save generics context for late devirtualization #63420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add instructions for running on FreeBSD #63417
    community-contribution
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics to simplify the SIMD code in the libraries #63416
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63415
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make DllImportGenerator unit tests' compilations use live refs #63410
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix ABI stress test coverage #63409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Avoiding Bimodal GC behavior #63408
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: rework logic for when OSR imports method entry #63406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] GetProperties broken on chrome #63403
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve Regex UpdateBumpalong optimization for non-atomic and lazy loops #63398
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #63393
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix Creating Cultures with Sort Names #63386
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Build fixes #63380

Merged

  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor fields of GenTreeCall #63402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete __SkipCrossgenFramework #63390
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] bump sourcebuild leg timeout #63298
    area-Infrastructure
  • Handle race condition when HttpListener is stopped or closed #63394
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63378
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Simplify condition in System.Private.CoreLib.Shared.projitems #63388
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix MethodDesc::CbStackPop for string ctors on x86 #63391
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove some unnecessary duplicated checks #63341
    area-Meta
  • Remove dead code in OdbcCommandBuilder.UnquoteIdentifier #63363
    area-System.Data
  • Implement `IEquatable<T>` on the runtime handle types. #63358
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Fix running WASM tests locally on Windows #63334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove dependency of type system tests on ILCompiler.ReadyToRun #63323
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move HttpRequestStream.{Begin}Read argument logging to after validation #63362
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix null ref for null Stream input in Icon.Save #63369
    area-System.Drawing
  • Remove unnecessary field writes in MimePart.SetContent #63368
    area-System.Net
  • Fix LazyMemberInfo.Equals to return false for null #63372
    area-System.ComponentModel

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1538093 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.x
  • Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #63351
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-Meta
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert SAL1 to SAL2 #63333
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reorganize zlib dependency logic #63365
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • HostBuilder.Build doc: mention lifetime #63123
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Update `dotnet6` to `dotnet7` NuGet feeds, bump Intellisensense package version to latest in `dotnet7-transport` #63352

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: is it possible to disable reflection and keep reflection for assemblies in rd.xml file ? #1798
  • aspcore-corert-ado-pg TechEmpower Benchmark does not compile on mac #1799

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Support nativelib for Wasm #1791

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOException in WorkloadResolver in 6.0.200 SDK #23264
  • CS8032 error in VS2019 if EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is set and .NET SDK 6 is installed #23261
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.IL is not creating documentation file #23257
  • "dotnet build --no-restore" restores all dependencies #23279

Closed

  • Reenable TestPreviewFeatures test #20325
  • UserSecretsId attribute not generated when M.E.C.UserSecrets reference transitively #4007
  • installing dotnet sdk on docker image fails with the new version of dotnet-sdk-5.0-5.0.404-1.x86_64 and aspnetcore-runtime-5.0.x86_64 0:5.0.13-1 #23069

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message (#23281) #23282
  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message #23281
  • Build Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks for netfx during source-build #23266
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Handle the case when procfs is inaccessible #22927
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add an environment variable to prevent prompting rude edits (#22891) #23280
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #23060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes aspnetcore#38798 #22891
  • reenable test #23236
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fixes dotnet/sdk#23162 dotnet new console --help doesn't work starting 6.0.2xx #23164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Opt into IEventSource4 #23249
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #23022
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Warn instead of Error for Windows7 SingleFile #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23232
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
    Servicing-consider
  • Update .vsts-ci-richnav.yml #22916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx

Issues

Closed

    Backlog
  • Discussion: C# Break nested loop #869

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILVerify throws NullRef exception in a couple tests #58652
  • Positional patterns on tuple inputs leads to confusion #58650
  • NullReferenceException in SyntaxInputNode.VisitTree #58647
  • Reinfer nullable annotation of 'var' variables #58645
    17.2
  • Compiler makes the wrong nullability assumption about unannotated code #58641
  • C#: erroneus CS8618 warning with partial class when definition is in one file and initialization in another #58640
    17.2
  • Syntax highlight breaks down for # right before an interpolated hole: $"#{foo}" #58637
  • Roslyn analyzer suggestion to convert a switch statement to switch expression alters runtime code behavior #58636
  • Incremental source generators do not recover from an exception #58625
    17.1

Closed

  • Intellisense changes existing, correct variable to capitalized option with same name (record class parameters) #57923
    17.1
  • Roslyn throws NRE after applying change on ASP.NET app #58651
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #58606
    17.2
  • VBCSCompilerServerTests+ShutdownTests.Standard is flaky #57837
    17.1
  • Expected warnings are not given for redundant subpatterns #58642
    17.2
  • Switch expression with 'object' receiver type inconsistently casts int to double #58634
  • VS 16.5.0 Preview 3.0 - IDE0071WithoutSuggestion #42096
    Backlog
  • IDE0059 False Positive with finally branch #42197
    Backlog
  • Intellisense, Syntax highlight and Error Window are badly broken with incremental source generator in Visual Studio 17.0.4 #58523
    17.1
  • InvalidOperationException: WaitAndGetResult cannot be called from a thread pool thread #58612
    17.1
  • Allow completion to add a global using rather than a file scoped using #58341
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove a first chance exception for normal cancellation #58646
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a few param-nullchecking parsing bugs #58644
    Area-Compilers
  • Verify correct additional location for reported diagnostic #58630
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Upgrade Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry to 16.4.22 #58621
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • [LSP] Fix semantic tokens overlap bug #58620
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3

Merged

  • Fix null reference in SyntaxInputNode #58649
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Move off deprecated Mac queue #58639
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix flaky compiler server test #58638
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge 17.2 branch back to main #58631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add truly synchronous indentation service interface for F# #57600
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58643
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58399
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58633
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58626
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58627
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Snapping for 17.1 P3 #58624
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove FileTextLoaderOptions #58596
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1 #58622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make TryNavigateToMetadataSymbol asynchronous #58617
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58601
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.1.P3

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58655
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Correctly handle null array constants from source and metadata #58604
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1536528 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove BackgroundParser and BackgroundCompiler #58453
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, UX Review Not Required
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor wasm - ability to independently prerender only HeadOutlet component #39333
  • Route Attribute not working as expected on ComponentBase / Blazor #39329
  • [Epic] WIP: Minimal APIs enhancements #39327
  • Perf regression: updates #39326
  • Consider enforcing `is null` instead of `== null`. #39323
  • Blazor Server Side AADB2C AllowAnonymous Not working in latest template #39321
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware breaks gRPC service response #39317
  • SignalR Core StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected? #39315

Closed

  • Segmentation fault in Docker ASP.NET core startup after .net6 upgrade #39253
  • RemoteJSRuntime uses SignalR global options instead of ComponentHub options #38205
    7.0-preview1
  • SignalR HubConnection is logging an incorrect Timeout #39171
    7.0-preview1
  • Implement <NavLink> for MVC/Razor Pages #39316
  • I have searched the existing issues #39322
  • Blazor WASM: File Upload - MultipartFormDataContent.Add() throws internal Invalid JSON exception #39087
    7.0-preview1
  • IClaimsTransformation TransformAsync not called in Firefox (asp.net core 6.0 razor pages web app) #39177

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid declaring RazorPage<T>.Model as nullable by default #39332
    area-mvc
  • Using symbolic link APIs on PhysicalFileResult to obtain the real Length and LastModifiedTime #39330
  • [release/6.0] Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39325
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Work around dotnet/msbuild#3274 #39293
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.2
  • Port of Bootstrap v4 SxS support to 7.0 #38865
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove source-build workaround for sourcelink submodule issue #39324
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Enforce braces for code-blocks #39320
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39318
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39075
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.2
  • Do not attempt `Publish test results` when skipping tests #39291
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Simplify some build infrastructure #38980
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI XAML Editor Lightbulbs not working #3966
  • Build fails with `MSB6006 "java.exe" exited with code 1` #3965
  • [Enhancement] Add Hosting Configuration helpers to load <settings>.settings / json configuration files #3963
  • CurrentCulture on iOS not available at startup #3962
  • Pre11, Visual Studio 2022 Mac- "The application has not been built" error #3961
  • API Documentation #3960
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync not working on iOS #3959
  • Can we integrate a DataTemplate with Drawable view? #3956
  • [WinUI] Convert TabbedRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3955
  • [iOS] Convert ShellRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3954
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Re-introduce usage of upstream MacCatalyst API's when Available #3953

Closed

  • Occasional endless maui project creation in VS 2022 Version 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 #3821
  • Use HttpClient in Maui #3742
  • TabbedPage inside a ShellContent fails on Android with Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException #3741
  • Creating a Page using a DataTemplate does not support Dependency Injection #3698
  • Back arrow not visible for navigation page in Android #3638
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() on Android leads to FileNotFoundException ('/etc/resolv.conf') #3617
  • Clear data on Android app will remove all DLLs and stops the app from running #2749
  • Navigation back causing app to crash #3511
  • System.MissingMethodException #3500
  • Getting object reference error while implement localization #2379
  • [Bug] Can't build an application with Resx files #2300
  • [Bug] Page crashes with TableView #2087
  • AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds crashes app when AutoSize is used #3632
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add Maui default global usings in SDK targets #1564
    6.0.101-preview.10

PullRequests

Merged

  • Put BoundsConverter on accessor in AbsoluteLayout #3930

Updated

  • GridLayout -> Grid to reduce confusion #3865
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲
  • ListView Handler for WinUI #3916
  • WinUI Flyout Handler #3735
    area/FlyoutPage, 6.0.200-preview.12
  • Init Essentials #3345
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPH Issue with navigation property when class not in same assembly #27122
  • Migrate from EFCore5 to EFCore6 - my first migration adds annotations for some properties in every single table. Why? #27121
  • SelectMany query on OwnsMany relationship throws exception #27120
  • Use of AddDbContextFactory() can't be easily overridden by Unit Tests #27118
  • How to perform multiple aggregates without a group by clause? #27117
  • Use ef core in source generators #27116
  • Migrator throwing "The migration was not found." #27115
  • With .NET 6, Some Navigation scenario doesn't contain column from Left join in Order By caluse #27114
  • Stop eagerly loading methods/members via reflection which aren't necessarily needed #27113
    7.0.0
  • "The entity of type ... does not have any property with a non-default value to identify whether the entity exists" #27111
  • upgrading from EF Core 5.0.2 to 6.0.1 making Nunit unit test to fail #27110

Closed

  • Possible breaking change from 5.0.12 to 6.0.1 when using ExecutionStrategy property on RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder #27018
  • EFCore 6 - Model is not getting validated when multiple columns have ValueGeneratedOnAdd() #27016
  • compiler errors in compiled model #27007
  • Referencing Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools from a WASDK 1.0 / WinUI 3 / .NET 6 project causes build to fail. #26973
  • Fluent Api - .Ignore() doesn't work for a specific property #27080
  • Referencing Base Type and Sub Type in same entity results in Ambiguous FK exception #26961
  • building an app with PublishTrimmed trims too much #27069
  • How do I find which entity (or entities) are throwing a circular dependency when reinitialising a scaffold? #27053
  • Website cannot load Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore #27029
  • Ef Core update 3.x to 5.x Connection String not working when using localhost ip instead of "localhost" #27112
  • Subquery is not translated #27082

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Query: Update column expression correctly when lifting joins from group by aggregate subquery #27109
  • [release/6.0] Lift GroupByAggregate when correlation predicate matches #27108

Merged

  • Fix spelling in LoggingDefinitions.LogSaveChangesCanceled. #27119

Updated

  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
